title: Bull ant warriors
creator_credit: George Pashuk and University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre
brief_description: Study of the chemistry and behaviour of the Australian Red Bull Ant being undertaken by a research team in which a colony of ants is re-established in the laboratory under controlled conditions. Using close-up photography, dissection techniques and behavioural experiments research is undertaken in developing methods of control by other than chemical means. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
